backend/main.mo: Actor backend implementing player profiles, abilities, access control, and XP/level progression with match XP awards and ability unlocking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled list of short summaries for all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with theme provider and routes for menu, loadout, fight, and results.
frontend/src/components/controls/TouchCo: Touch UI overlay providing movement, attack, block, and C-spec buttons for mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/hud/AbilityBar.t: Renders six ability slots showing icons, cooldown overlays, and keybind numbers.
frontend/src/components/hud/CSpecIndicat: Displays Sharingan C-spec activation status with icon, active/cooldown state, and progress bar.
frontend/src/components/hud/FightHud.tsx: Displays player/enemy health bars, round info, ability bar, and overlays for round results and match end.
frontend/src/components/hud/RoundScorebo: Shows the current round number and the player's and enemy's round scores.
frontend/src/components/layout/GameLayou: Wraps the game UI with background styling and a fixed footer.
frontend/src/components/loadout/AbilityS: Lets players assign abilities to slots and pick from available abilities.
frontend/src/components/loadout/StylePic: Allows selection of a fighting style with stats and visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileB: Displays a player's name, level, and XP progress.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating and saving a new player profile by entering a name.
frontend/src/game/content/styles.ts: Defines fighting styles and elemental abilities with stats and metadata.
frontend/src/game/engine/GameEngine.ts: Core game loop handling fighters, abilities, state updates, and rendering.
frontend/src/game/input/InputManager.ts: Tracks keyboard, mouse, and gamepad input to produce action states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player profile data and awarding match XP using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, and global styles for typography, colors, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FightPage.tsx: Initializes the game engine and input manager, runs the fight loop, and navigates to the results page when a match ends.
frontend/src/pages/LoadoutPage.tsx: Allows players to choose a fighting style and abilities, saving the loadout to session storage and starting a fight.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Displays the main menu with login/logout, mode selection, and profile handling, and navigates to loadout on match start.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows match results, awards XP if authenticated, computes level progression, and provides navigation to restart or return to menu.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, fonts, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing game concept, required assets, existing features, and versioned project state for a 2D anime-style fighting game.
